description:
Updated with sustainability in mind, our Revolution has undergone an evolution. Just as bomber as the previous generation, the Revolution jacket now uses a recycled nylon material to keep you dry. It has a tailored cut that fits over layers but doesn't billow in the wind when you're riding. Burly enough for regular use, it has excellent venting options, lots of reflectivity and zippered pockets to keep it super-functional and practical even when you're off the bike.

  • Made of 3-layer recycled nylon waterproof-breathable fabric with a PU non-porous hydrophilic laminate
  • Fully taped seams and durable water repellent finish that boosts the waterproofness of the fabric
  • Reverse coil front zipper is backed with a wind flap and has a soft chin guard
  • Soft fleece inner collar adds comfort and functions as a gasket to prevent cold air and wetness from funneling in
  • Underarm zips for venting
  • Water-resistant zippered chest pocket
  • Hook-and-loop closures on cuffs
  • Cut is slightly longer in back for coverage in the riding position
  • Drawcord in back to keep the shape aerodynamic
  • 360° reflectivity with tape and piping to keep you visible from all angles
  • Back length is 30in. for medium size
name: MEC Revolution Jacket - Men's
